a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Children orphaned due to AIDS deaths, 1990 to 2022
Number of children, aged 17 and under, who have been orphaned by the death of one or both parents from AIDS
at any point in their lives.
Data source: Joint United Nations Programme on HIV/AIDS (2023)
